thread.title: EU threatens retaliaton to Trump tariffs

title: EU threatens retaliaton to Trump tariffs
text:
EU threatens retaliaton to Trump tariffs 1:21pm GMT - 01:46 
European shares open lower but investors appear to hold their nerve after the announcement of U.S. import duties set by U.S. President Donald Trump. As Laura Frykberg reports, the European Union expects to be excluded from the tariffs, according to its Trade Commissioner, Cecilia Malmstrom.   
European shares open lower but investors appear to hold their nerve after the announcement of U.S. import duties set by U.S. President Donald Trump. As Laura Frykberg reports, the European Union expects to be excluded from the tariffs, according to its Trade Commissioner, Cecilia Malmstrom.  //reut.rs/2IfFJSz
